00008 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( ZeroLimit )
00009 {
00010         CountLimitNode* node = new CountLimitNode(0);
00011         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(0));
00012         node->init(NULL);
00013 
00014         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_FAILURE);
00015 
00016         delete node;
00017 }

00019 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( ThreeLimit )
00020 {
00021         CountLimitNode* node = new CountLimitNode(3);
00022         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(0));
00023         
00024         for (int i =0 ; i<2 ; i++)
00025         {
00026                 node->init(NULL);
00027                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00028                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00029                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00030                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_FAILURE);
00031         }
00032         delete node;
00033 }

00035 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( ThreeLimitWithRuntime )
00036 {
00037         CountLimitNode* node = new CountLimitNode(3);
00038         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(1));
00039         
00040         for (int i =0 ; i<2 ; i++)
00041         {
00042                 node->init(NULL);
00043                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_RUNNING);
00044                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00045                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_RUNNING);
00046                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00047                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_RUNNING);
00048                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00049                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_FAILURE);

00056 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( ThreeLimitWithRuntime_Failure )
00057 {
00058         CountLimitNode* node = new CountLimitNode(3);
00059         node->addChild(new FailureAfter(1));
00060 
00061         for (int i =0 ; i<2 ; i++)
00062         {
00063                 node->init(NULL);
00064                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_RUNNING);
00065                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_FAILURE);

00067                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_FAILURE);

00077 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( ThreeLimitDisableReinit )
00078 {
00079         CountLimitNode* node = new CountLimitNode(3,false);
00080         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(0));
00081         
00082         node->init(NULL);
00083         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00084         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00085         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_SUCCESS);
00086         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_FAILURE);
00087 
00088         for (int i =0 ; i<2 ; i++)
00089         {
00090                 node->init(NULL);
00091                 BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(NULL),BT_FAILURE);
